text: The Speedo Tournament was a golf tournament held in Australia in 1955 and 1956. Total prize money was A£2,000. The sponsor was Speedo, an Australian swimwear manufacturer. ==Winners== {| class="wikitable" !Year !! Winner !! Country !! Venue !! Score !! Margin of victory !! Runner-up !! Winner's share (A£) !! title: Speedo Tournament
